titleStmt.title: The loving shepherd: or, Phaon's humble petition to beautiful Phillis, who readily answered his request. To an excellent new tune much in request. Licensed according to order.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for P. Brooksby, J. Deacon, J. Blare, J. Back.,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "When first on my Phillis, I cast my eye ..."
Date and place of publication suggested by Wing.
Item at A5:2[245] imperfect: trimmed, affecting imprint, and stained.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University, Houghton Library and the British Library.
